content: Dear White, Orange has launched an unprovoked and aggressive assault on Purple, resulting in significant loss of life and damage. We request your immediate support in countering Orange's attack and defending our sovereignty. Your assistance would be crucial in deterring any further aggression and restoring stability in the region.

Dear Pink, Orange has attacked Purple without any justification, causing widespread destruction and loss of life. We seek your support in condemning Orange's aggressive behavior and standing with us against this act of aggression. Together, we can send a strong message to Orange that their actions will not be tolerated.

Dear Red, Orange's assault on Purple has endangered regional stability and violated international norms. We urge you to condemn Orange's actions and join us in countering their aggression. A united front against Orange's expansionist ambitions is crucial to preserving peace in the region.

Dear Yellow, Orange's attack on Purple has resulted in a grave humanitarian crisis and threatens the security of the entire region. We call upon you to denounce Orange's aggression and collaborate with us to counter their territorial ambitions. Together, we can ensure the sovereignty and stability of our nations.
